TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Lidaw, title = Lidaw, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lidaw} }

S.FORM: Lidaw Itiniay i Ji'an Cen no Hualien ko Lidaw| a niyaro', 1,118 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 2,835 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 32% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 899 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 68% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 1,936 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 29%, Truku 1%, roma 1%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.

Lidaw Itiniay i Ji'an Cen no Hoalien ko Lidaw| a niyaro', 1,118 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 2,835 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 32% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 899 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 68% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 1,936 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 29%, Troko 1%, roma 1%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.
